word: G5101 - τίς - tís - tis - Every man

sections.paragraph: ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Probably emphatic of G5100; an interrogitive pronoun, who, which or what (in direct or indirect questions): - every man, how (much), + no (-ne, thing), what (manner, thing), where ([-by, -fore, -of, -unto, -with, -withal]), whether, which, who (-m, -se), why.
